articles.title: NDC of DPRK Clarifies Stand on U.S. Hostile Policy towards It
articles.content:
NDC of DPRK Clarifies Stand on U.S. Hostile Policy towards It
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The National Defence Commission of the DPRK released a statement Friday in connection with the fact that the U.S. hostile policy towards it and its recent moves pursuant to the policy have gone to such a grave pass that they cannot be overlooked any longer.
					 The statement says:
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which has deliberately infringed upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, the life and soul of its people, century after century. It is again the U.S., the sworn enemy, which has resorted to crafty and foolish moves to undermine the ideology of the DPRK and bring down its social system.
					
					 The National Defence Commission of the DPRK clarifies the following principled stand on the U.S. hostile policy towards it, representing the unanimous will of the Workers' Party of Korea, state, army and people:
					
					1. The U.S. should make a policy decision to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and lift all the measures pursuant to the policy, though belatedly.
					
					 The above-said policy is the harshest one aimed at undermining the ideology of the DPRK and bringing down its social system by dint of U.S.-style democracy and market economy, and swallowing up all Koreans and the whole of Korea by force of arms for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to lift by itself all unjust measures in all fields before facing the disastrous consequences to be entailed by its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					2. The U.S. should have a proper viewpoint and stand on the DPRK's nuclear deterrence and stop behaving foolishly, letting loose a string of reckless remarks that the "DPRK's dismantlement of its nukes first" is the "keynote" of the hostile policy towards it.
					
					 The U.S. should properly understand that Pyongyang's nuclear deterrence is neither a means for bargaining nor a plaything to be used by it keen on dialogue and blinded by the improvement of relations.
					
					 Moreover, the DPRK's nuclear deterrence is by no means a ghost-like means which does not exist when it is not recognized by the U.S. or remains when it is "recognized" by it. 
					
					 The U.S. is resorting to what it calls "patience strategy", hoping the DPRK to move and make changes first, but such things desired by  Washington will never happen.
					
					  It is the stand of the DPRK to wait with a high degree of patience for the time when the White House is bossed by a person with normal insight and way of thinking.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that the efforts of the army and people of the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence will go on and additional measures will be taken to demonstrate its might one after another as long as the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail persist as now.
					
					3. The U.S. should stop at once its groundless "human rights" racket against the DPRK which began as part of its new hostile policy towards the latter.
					
					 National sovereignty is more important than human rights.
					
					 Probably this is the reason why the U.S. has kept more prisoners than any other countries in the world, mercilessly brandishing sharp swords against any forces opposed to the state and endangering its existence.
					
					 The DPRK also does not show any mercy and leniency towards a tiny handful of hostile elements doing harm to the ideology and social system chosen by all its people who are the masters of the sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to mind its own business, being aware of where it stands, before talking nonsense about others' affairs.
					
					 The U.S. had better roll back its worn-out hostile policy towards the DPRK as soon as possible and shape a new realistic policy before it is too late. This would be beneficial not only to meeting the U.S. interests but also to ensuring the security of its mainland. 
					
					 The U.S. should judge the situation with a cool head and make a policy decision in line with the trend of the times, the statement concludes.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Condemns South Korean Confrontation Maniacs' Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Condemns South Korean Confrontation Maniacs' Smear Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Friday made public a statement denouncing the south Korean anti-reunification confrontation maniacs for bringing their smear campaign against their fellow countrymen in the north to an extreme phase despite of its  repeated warnings. 
					 Yu Song Ok, director of the "Institute for Security Strategy" under the Intelligence Service (IS) of south Korea, in a special lecture in the "Unified Economy Classroom," gathering of lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party", on March 11 malignantly hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. The director let loose such unspeakable invectives as "ferocious nature" and "terror-ridden politics." Yu went the lengths of describing the social system in the north as a "car out of order" and a "possible contingency." 
					
					 The statement said this is a grave mud-slinging at the north and an intolerable hideous provocation against the dignity of the supreme leadership and social system in the DPRK as they are based on sheer, groundless lies and fabrications. 
					
					 What matters is that the ruling "Saenuri Party" zealously joined IS in its despicable smear campaign, it said, and went on:
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" let the wild and wicked person of IS with bitter tongue give a special lecture. By doing so, it defamed itself and earned the same ill fame as IS has. Consequently, it sparked bitterer curse among people with the elections to the local self-governing bodies at hand. 
					
					 The recent provocation amounts to crudely violating the agreement made at the north-south high-level contact on halting the smear campaign against the other side and blatantly challenging it.
					
					 The moves for improving the north-south relations which had drawn great concern of the people at home and abroad from the outset of the year have hit a serious snag and the expectation and hope of the compatriots met frustration and disappointment owing to the sinister provocations of the puppet conservative regime.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the south Korean authorities excuse themselves for their mud-slinging.
					
					 If they have true intention to build confidence and repair their relations with the north, they should move to make an apology for the recent grave provocation against the DPRK's social system and take responsible measures against the recurrence of similar provocation.
					
					 The DPRK considers the north-south relations as important but it will never tolerate even the least the acts of daring hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership and its social system.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Revolutionary Ideological Offensive
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Revolutionary Ideological Offensive 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial calls for making a breakthrough in the revolutionary ideological offensive by raising a strong wind of studying Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					 It goes on:
					
					 To study the leader's revolutionary idea is the first process to accomplish the cause of modeling the whole party and society on the monolithic ideology and a prerequisite to giving full play to the mental power of all the service personnel and people.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism serves as the only guidelines for the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the textbook of the revolution which comprehensively deals with the noble life of the great revolutionary and great man. It deals with the ideological and moral traits which the revolutionaries in the present era should have. They include persevering spirit of overcoming difficulties, revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude, will to make uninterrupted revolution and revolutionary optimism.
					
					 Those who are fully equipped with Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism do not allow such practices as counting on other's help, remaining self-complacent with the successes already achieved and making a detour because of hardships and trials on the road of the revolution.
					
					 Those who have grasped Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the steadfast faith through study will remain true to the revolutionary principles, though left all alone on an isolated island, and will never waver even in face of the enemies' appeasement and deception. 
					
					 Eternal dignity, glory and prosperity are in store for the country and the nation when all service personnel and people keep to the road indicated by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism without an inch of deflection, the editorial concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Korea's Reunification Based on Three Principles
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Korea's Reunification Based on Three Principles 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The three principles of national reunification and the idea of By Our Nation Itself are the most reasonable and effective principles and idea common to the nation to achieve Korea's reunification, true to the will and aspiration of the entire nation, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The three principles of national reunification -- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity -- which were solemnly declared through the July 4 joint statement at home and abroad serve as a cornerstone of Korea's reunification as they clarify the fundamental stand and basic ways for solving the issue of the reunification of the country by concerted efforts of the Koreans in line with the will and interests of the nation. 
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself set forth in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration represents the idea of national independence and unity and a basic idea of achieving independent reunification in the new century as it calls for independently achieving the reunification of the country by concerted efforts of the Koreans who are responsible for reunification. 
					
					 The three principles of national reunification and the idea of By Our Nation Itself are the most fair and vital ones to be respected, preserved and implemented by the north and the south. 
					
					 The north and the south should absolutely respect in any case the July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration which the north and the south jointly agreed upon and declared at home and abroad. They should hold fast to the three principles of national reunification and the idea of By Our Nation Itself reflected in the great programmes for reunification as common principles and idea for settling the issue of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 It is the demand of the times and aspiration and steadfast will of all Koreans to achieve the reunification of the country on the three principles of national reunification and in the idea of By Our Nation Itself. 
					
					 A rosy future of independent reunification, peace and prosperity is sure to be opened when the north and the south aspire to the improved inter-Korean relations and the reunification of the country on the three principles of national reunification and the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Statement of KPA Strategic Force Spokesman Distributed as UNSC Official Document
articles.content:
Statement of KPA Strategic Force Spokesman Distributed as UNSC Official Document
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The statement of the spokesman for the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army "U.S. Urged to Drop Bad Habit of Deliberately Blaming Others" was distributed at the UNSC as an official document S/2014/159 on March 11.

articles.title: Symposium on Medical Science to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Symposium on Medical Science to Be Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The 16th Symposium on Medical Science will be held here on May 5 under the sponsorship of the Medical Association of Korea (MAK) with attendance of Korean medical scientists at home and abroad.
					 In this regard, Kim Mun Song, a department director of the Central Committee of the Association, told KCNA:
					
					 The forthcoming symposium will be a significant get-together of compatriot medical scientists who are willing to make contributions to the development of the nation's medical science and technology. A number of medical scientists at home and abroad have applied for attending it.
					
					 The symposium, divided into basic, preventive, internal and surgical medicines, will share the achievements and experience conducive to developing the nation's medical science.
					
					 It also envisages lecture, collective surgical operation, hands-on training as well as sightseeing of scenic spots.
					
					 The Association is now pressing ahead with preparations for the successful symposium. 
					
					(MAK Fax: 850-2-381-4410, 4416
					
					P.O. Box: 220
					
					E-mail: medigroup@star-net.kp)

articles.title: Sister Weightlifters of DPRK
articles.content:
Sister Weightlifters of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Rim Un Sim and Rim Jong Sim are sister weightlifters of the DPRK, who have proved successful at various international tournaments.
					 Younger sister Rim Un Sim bagged three gold medals in the women's 58 kg division of the 2014 Asian Junior and Juvenile Weightlifting Championship held in Thailand on March 10, with lift of 93 kg in snatch and 113 kg in jerk, 206 kg in total. She came second in the total of women's 53 kg category at the 2013 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championship.
					
					 Elder sister Rim Jong Sim took the women's 69 kg title at the 2012 London Olympiad and set new records at the 6th East Asian Games.
					
					 She also won the title at the 2013 Asian Cup and Interclub Junior and Senior Weightlifting Championship held in Pyongyang and was selected as one of the country's ten best athletes for 2012.
					
					 The sisters, active at the Kigwancha Sports Team, are now filled with resolve to further glorify the honor of the DPRK at international tournaments.

articles.title: Punishment of Chief Architect of False Spy Case Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Chief Architect of False Spy Case Demanded in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Situation Council to Denounce IS Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation held a candlelight action in Seoul on March 11. It condemned the fabrication by the Intelligence Service (IS), according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People. 
					 Speakers there recalled that IS, which had been engrossed in red herrings during the "presidential election," cooked up a spy case this time, sparking public uproar. 
					
					 Though the present chief executive expressed her regret at the behavior of IS, she should have made an apology to the people and promised to fire the IS director. 
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The promise made by the chief executive to probe the truth behind the recent case is just the same as what she uttered when IS interference in the election was disclosed. However, the result was not probe into the truth but disorganization of the special investigation team responsible for the case. 
					
					 They demanded that the truth behind the fabricated spy case be probed without fail and its mastermind be punished.

articles.title: Stop to Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket Demanded in South Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket Demanded in South Korea  
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Christian Churches demanded a halt to the institution of "law on human rights issue in the north" on March 12, according to the south Korean CBS. 
					 The council said that the move pushed forward by the regime and the "National Assembly" to institute "law on human rights issue in the north" is a very serious issue as it may foster south-north conflict and ignite a war on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 It is the most important to stop war drills and mud-slinging and opt for dialogue for building confidence between the south and the north, the council held.

articles.title: Dismantlement of Intelligence Service Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Dismantlement of Intelligence Service Demanded in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in Kwangju of south Korea held a news conference in Kwangju on March 11 in demand of the dismantlement of the Intelligence Service (IS), according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People. 
					 Speakers at the news conference said that south Koreans were greatly shocked once again by IS's fabrication of a spy case, an anachronistic action. 
					
					 They called for disbanding IS to prevent the recurrence of such act as making innocent people spies. 
					
					 The director of the Intelligence Service and the minister of Justice should be fired at once and the truth behind power bodies' interference in the election be fully probed, they held. 
					
					 The chairman of the Kwangju Council of Christian Churches said that the recent false spy case was aimed to maintain the present regime, adding there is no reason for IS to exist any longer. 
					
					 Regional organizations in South Jolla Province held a news conference in Ryosu City, South Jolla Province, on the same day, urging the dismantlement of IS. 
					
					 The organizations noted that IS, driven to a tight corner, is trying hard to shift all responsibilities onto others and cover up the truth behind the case. 
					
					 They branded IS as a criminal group and social evil as it fabricates all sorts of false cases making people targets of its political operations.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Austria
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Austria
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- An Austrian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) was inaugurated in Vienna, Austria on Feb. 24.
					 The chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give much publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and hold diverse political events to celebrate his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Beninese Political Leader Supports Statement of Spokesman for KPA Strategic Force
articles.content:
Beninese Political Leader Supports Statement of Spokesman for KPA Strategic Force 
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, fully supported the statement of the spokesman for the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Mar. 7.
					 The statement referred to the fact that units of the KPA Strategic Force successfully conducted rocket-launching drills according to the regular training plans of fire power units.
					
					 However, the U.S. and its followers are making much fuss about the DPRK's justifiable drills, terming them "provocation and threat", the statement said.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Isn't a provocation for them to label the DPRK a "country of evils" while staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises against it? All members of the Socialist Party of Benin hold that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are not "annual drills for defence" to cope with any "provocation" but undisguised acts to drive the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase and pose a serious military threat to the DPRK and, at the same time, vitiate the climate for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving independent reunification and start a war. We strongly demand an immediate halt to those war rehearsals.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK will surely achieve the final victory in their drive to build a thriving socialist country and defend the sovereignty of the country under the outstanding leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Blast U.S. Provocations against DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Blast U.S. Provocations against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Mar. 
					5 in support of the statement of the spokesman for the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Terming the on-going U.S.-south Korea military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle a real provocation and threat to the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 The U.S. justifies its war drills for aggression as "defensive and annual ones" though it is staging them in other country's land with a sinister purpose while describing the justifiable self-defensive drills conducted by the KPA in its own land as a "provocation". This is the brazen-faced U.S.-style standards.
					
					 It is the arrogant behavior of the U.S. which is fond of accusing others and praising itself.
					
					 Secretary of State Kerry labeled the DPRK a "country of evils." His outburst is a shameless provocation, too.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists seek to escalate the tension again under the pretext of the KPA's self-defensive rocket-launching drills, vociferating about the "same sanctions" slapped against Iran and "more stringent blockade."
					
					 This is an open aggressive move.
					
					 We fully support the statement of the spokesman for the KPA Strategic Force and vehemently assail the U.S. provocation and threat to the DPRK.
					
					 We, at the same time, denounce the U.S. for its string of balderdash that the north-south relations can be mended only when the north dismantles its nuclear weapons first and there will be dialogue and improved relations between the U.S. and north Korea only  when the latter moves first.
					
					 The U.S. had better scrap its arsenal of weapons of mass destruction and withdraw its troops from south Korea, to begin with, before letting loose such rhetoric.

articles.title: CDN de RPDC declara posicion en cuanto a politica hostil de EE.UU.
articles.content:
CDN de RPDC declara posicion en cuanto a politica hostil de EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias, la politica hostil y las acciones de Estados Unidos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se  tornan peligrosas hasta no mas, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 14 una declaracion.
					 El documento revela que EE.UU. es precisamente el que ha venido pisoteando atrevidamente la soberania de la RPDC considerada como su vida, y el enemigo jurado que actua absurdamente para destruir la idea y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					 En reflejo de la unanime voluntad del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado, el ejercito y el pueblo, el CDN de la RPDC expuso al interior y al exterior la siguiente posicion de principios:
					
					 1. Antes de tardar por mas tiempo, EE.UU. debera tomar la decision politica de abandonar su politica hostil anti-RPDC y todas las medidas concernientes.
					
					 La politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. es la mas brutal encaminada a destruir la idea y el regimen de la RPDC con la democracia al estilo norteamericano y la economia de mercado y ocupar con las fuerzas militares agresivas toda la nacion coreana y todo el territorio de Corea.
					
					 Antes de afrontarse con las consecuencias catastroficas que se emanen su anacronica politica hostil anti-RPDC, seria mejor que abandone por si mismo todas las medidas injustas. 
					
					 2. EE.UU. no debe portarse neciamente chismeando atrevidamente que la "renuncia primero de armas nucleares" es el "principio fundamental" de la politica hostil anti-RPDC al tener un correcto criterio y posicion en cuanto al disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					 EE.UU. debe saber correctamente que el disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC no es el medio de negocios y regateo a usarse para el dialogo y el mejoramiento de relaciones.
					
					 Ademas no es el medio fantasmal que desaparece si el imperio no lo "reconoce" y existe si lo "reconoce".
					
					 El imperio estadounidense recurre a la llamada "estrategia de paciencia" deseando que la RPDC se mueva primero y cambie algo, pero tal resultado nunca le tocara a ese pais norteamericano.
					
					 Al contrario, la RPDC tiene la posicion de esperar con paciencia hasta que entre en la Casa Blanca el dueno que tenga una normal vision y reflexion realistas.
					
					 El imperio debe tener presente que mientras siga aferrandose a la amenaza y el chantaje nuclear, los uniformados y civiles de la RPDC lucharan de continuo por intensificar el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo y tomaran sucesivamente las medidas adicionales para demostrar su poderio.
					
					 3. EE.UU. debera poner de inmediato fin a la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, iniciada como una parte de nueva politica hostil a esta.
					
					 Se dice que sobre DDHH hay el poder estatal.
					
					 Por lo tanto, tambien EE.UU. rechaza sin titubeo a las fuerzas que se oponen al Estado y dan peligro a su existencia y tiene mayor numero de encarcelados en el mundo.
					
					 Tampoco hacemos caridad ni tolerancia a las minimas fuerzas malsanas que atentan la ideologia y el regimen, optados por si mismo por el pueblo, dueno del poder.
					
					  Seria mejor para EE.UU. limpiar primero su nariz antes de censurar a otros.
					
					 Abandonar cuanto antes su vieja politica hostil anti-RPDC y establecer la nueva politica real sera util no solo para intereses nacionales de EE.UU. sino que tambien para la seguridad de su territorio propio.
					
					 El imperio norteamericano debe apreciar serenamente la realidad y tomar la decision politica adecuada a la situacion general.

articles.title: CRPP rechaza calumnia a dignidad y regimen de RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP rechaza calumnia a dignidad y regimen de RPDC
 Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que a contrapelo de las reiteradas advertencias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en el Sur de Corea paso limite la difamacion a los connacionales de los maniacos conflictivos anti-reunificacion, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 14 una declaracion.
					 En una conferencia especial efectuada el dia 11 en "Aula de economia unificada", encuentro de los parlamentarios del "Partido Saenuri", Yu Song Ok, presidente del "Instituto de la Estrategia de Seguridad" adscrito al Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia desacredito la maxima dignidad de la RPDC tildandole de "brutalidad" y de "politica de terror".
					
					 Tambien, describio el regimen de esta como un "carro averiado" hablando de "posibilidad de una situacion emergente".
					
					 La nota lo califica de una grave difamacion a la RPDC llena del contenido totalmente absurdo, intrigante y falsificado, y de imperdonable provocacion contra la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					 Lo problematico es que el "Partido Saenuri" en poder, se suma a tal campana del SNI, subraya la nota y prosigue:
					
					 Al presentar a ese chismoso inculto del SNI en la conferencia especial, el "Partido Saenuri" perdio por si mismo su popularidad, adquirio la infamia de que su organizacion politica es identica al SNI y produjo asi la repudia de los habitantes en visperas de las inminentes elecciones de autonomia local. 
					
					 La presente provocacion deviene un acto desafiante para revolcar intencionalmente el acuerdo de cesar las censuras y difamaciones a la contraparte, firmado en el contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur. 
					
					 Debido a las malsanas maniobras provocativas de la banda conservadora titere, se afronta con grandes obstaculos el movimiento a la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas que acapara este ano la gran esperanza interna y externa.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas no tienen la calificacion de justificarlo aunque tengan diez bocas.
					
					 Si tienen de veras la voluntad de fomentar la confianza y mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur, deberan pedir disculpa por el presente acto provocativo de haber calumniado a nuestro regimen y tomar las medidas responsables para prevenir otro caso similar. 
					
					 Nosotros apreciamos las relaciones intercoreanas, pero no toleraremos jamas la atrevida difamacion a nuestra maxima dignidad y regimen que constituyen nuestra vida.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a armarse con kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a armarse con kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo
 Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico este viernes un editorial llamando a abrir la brecha de la ofensiva ideologica revolucionaria de hoy con el fervor de estudio del kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
					 Estudiar la idea revolucionaria del lider es el primer curso para el cumplimiento de la causa de identificacion ideologica de todo el partido y toda la sociedad y requisito primordial para poner de pleno manifiesto la fuerza espiritual de todos los militares y civiles, adelanta el editorial y continua:
					
					 El kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo es la unica guia directriz del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la revolucion coreana.
					
					 Sirve de manual de la revolucion porque sintetiza las nobles vidas revolucionarias de los grandes revolucionarios y grandes hombres y refleja todos los rasgos ideo-espirituales de los revolucionarios de la epoca actual, entre otros, el espiritu de explotacion, el de autoconfianza y el de lucha tenaz, la voluntad de hacer de continuo la revolucion y el optimismo revolucionario. 
					
					 Las personas armadas con firmeza con el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo no demandan la ayuda de otros ni sienten contentas con los exitos ya alcanzados ni van rodeando los obstaculos y pruebas en el camino de la revolucion. 
					
					 No vacilan en las cualesquier adormecimientos y enganos de los enemigos manteniendo la constancia revolucionaria. 
					
					 En avanzar sin desviacion hacia el camino indicado por el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo residen la eterna dignidad, gloria y  prosperidad de la patria y la nacion.

articles.title: Reunificacion de Corea debe ser lograda segun principios comunes de nacion
articles.content:
Reunificacion de Corea debe ser lograda segun principios comunes de nacion
 Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual divulgado el dia 14, el diario Rodong Sinmun subraya que los tres principios de la reunificacion de la patria y el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" son los principios e ideal comunes mas justos y poderosos que permiten realizar la reunificacion de la patria segun la voluntad y el deseo de toda la nacion coreana.
					 Los tres principios de la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional, declarados al interior y exterior del pais a traves de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, presentaron la posicion y el metodo fundamentales que posibilitan solucionar el problema de reunificacion con las propias fuerzas segun la voluntad y el interes de la nacion, senala el articulo y continua:
					
					 El ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", indicado en la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, es el ideal de la independencia y la unidad nacional y el fundamental de la reunificacion independiente de nuevo siglo, que exhorta a toda la nacion coreana, duena de la empresa coreana, a juntar sus fuerzas para solucionarla de manera independiente.
					
					 Los tres principios y el ideal en cuestion son los principios e ideal fundamentales de la reunificacion mas imparciales y vitales a ser respetados y mantenidos por ambas partes coreanas.
					
					 En cualquier caso, el Norte y el Sur de Corea deben respetar absolutamente las tres declaraciones acordadas y declaradas comunmente al interior y exterior del pais y mantener los tres principios y el ideal como principios y ideal comunes para solucionar el problema de relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					 La reintegracion territorial debe ser lograda segun los tres principios y el ideal, lo que es la demanda de la epoca y la aspiracion y la voluntad inconmovible de todos los coreanos.
					
					 Se abrira sin falta el radiante porvenir de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad cuando las ambas partes coreanas aspiren a la mejora de las relaciones y la reunificacion manteniendose en la posicion de los tres principios de la reunificacion de la patria y el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
